patterns_discovered: Documentation updates are typically minimal but critical for project tracking
Implementation plans serve as the source of truth for task status updates
Status changes are propagated across multiple documentation files
Detailed completion notes include quantitative metrics (line counts) and qualitative achievements

gotchas_discovered: Documentation must be consistent across all tracking files (build-progress.txt and implementation_plan.json)
Status updates need timestamp information for accurate tracking
Completion notes should capture both structural changes (file counts/line counts) and functional outcomes (zero breaking changes)
Technical observations help maintain context for future refactoring efforts
